jobDescription: Data Scientist  If you are passionate for digging into large datasets and discovering insights that drive material business results, then please listen closely! Our client is seeking a BI Data Scientist to join their team on a contract to hire or direct hire basis. Responsibilities:Develop, own, and monitor reporting for our core products and revenue streams using data from multiple sourcesDevelop a deep understanding of our data and user engagement life-cycle to drive insights and answer key questions from stakeholdersManage, understand and analyze data for trends, patterns, and failure points, and communicate analysis to stakeholdersWork with stakeholders to build rich dashboards and reports in Tableau for company-wide consumptionRequirements:Experience analyzing complex, high volume data to produce meaningful insights and practical recommendationsStrong hands-on SQL experience with complex queries against large datasetsComfortable manipulating, transforming and combining large, disparate datasetsExperience using tools like Tableau for creating dashboards, reports and data visualizationsExperience using analytics packages in languages like Python or RExcellent communication skills with both technical and non-technical peopleStrong technical background in math, engineering, or statisticsPreferred experience: Creating data models, predictions, and forecasts to support executive business decision makingPreferred experience: Driving decisions that had a significant impact on business outcomes and/or revenue
